stories.text:
Going to a university abroad, want to quit it and move back to the states.

My parents expect me to get a degree (they'd be fine with even an associates) and I don't hate the prospect but I'd prefer to start spending my time working on side projects (very rough list of random ideas: https://rajspace.brick.do/. there are plenty more in my head).

I'm looking for something: -cheap -not too time consuming (10-20 hours per week) -ideally an associates degree with optionality to transfer to undergrad

I'm thinking of doing computer science since it's been a long-term interest. At the same time, I'm more interested in UI design but I'm not sure I'd want to study it for a full 2-4 years. I'm open to something completely different with studying programming myself on the side too.

Any suggestions on universities/courses?
